titleStmt.title: Directions to know the true church. Written by George Carleton, Doctor of Diuinitie
titleStmt.author: Carleton, George, 1559-1628.

notesStmt.note: Heading, A2r has "Charles". Variant: heading in an earlier setting, with "Chales".
Identified as STC 4632a on UMI microfilm reel 646.
Reproductions of the originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library and Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge). Library.
Appears at reel 646 (Folger Shakespeare Library copy) and at reel 1478 (Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge). Library copy).
